text: Mark V. Meierhenry (October 29, 1944 - July 29, 2020) was an American attorney and politician. He was the 26th Attorney General of South Dakota from 1979 to 1987. He was born in Gregory, South Dakota. He was a member of the Republican Party. Meierhenry died in Sioux Falls, South Dakota on July 29, 2020 at his home in Sioux Falls, South Dakota at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Lawyers from South Dakota Category:Politicians from South Dakota Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Mark V. Meierhenry
